scripts.build:css: sass --load-path=node_modules static/scss/theme.scss static/css/theme.css --no-source-map && sass --load-path=node_modules static/scss/theme.scss static/css/theme.min.css --no-source-map --style=compressed
scripts.watch:css: sh -c 'sass --load-path=node_modules static/scss/theme.scss static/css/theme.css --watch & sass --load-path=node_modules static/scss/theme.scss static/css/theme.min.css --watch --style=compressed'
